Header: Highrise NFT Safety Tips
Paragraphs: ['', "As a holder of Highrise Creature Club and Highrise LAND NFTs, it's important to stay vigilant against common scam tactics.", '', '\u200b\u200bOftentimes, scammers will attempt to mimic profile photos, banners, and usernames of official staff accounts and/or well known members of the community. They will then attempt to reach out to you privately and ask that you to verify your NFT to ensure authenticity. They may also attempt to offer middleman services or offer assistance with the buying and selling of your NFT. All of which are common scam tactics. An example is listed below:', "Be sure to compare Discord usernames, Discord join dates and mutual servers. Always verify who you're speaking to within the Highrise Game to ensure you're communicating with the same person on Discord!", "\u200b\u200bWhen attempting to sell your Highrise Slime Blob or Highrise Creature through the Official listing sites (Immutable X Marketplace, Blur, or TokenTrove), someone may reach out and claim that they are attempting to purchase your asset but are unable to and instead, receive an error. They may attempt to convince you that you haven't updated your wallet and in order to go forward with the sale, you'll need to connect your wallet to a website such as MultiBridger and send you a screenshot that appears similar to the ones shown below:", 'By going to this website and connecting your wallet, you are granting the scammer complete access and control. They will drain your wallet of all assets and funds, leaving you with nothing.', 'Avoid connecting your wallet to any website that is sent to you via private message! Only use the Official links provided through the Official Highrise Discord Server or through the Highrise Creature Club and Land Helpshift guides in-app.', '', "It's important to ensure that you're using the official links provided in the Official Highrise Discord Server or through the Highrise Creature Club and Land Helpshift guides in-app to protect yourself from false collections online. False collections are collections that look identical but don't actually provide you with the NFT and associated benefits. It's simply a screenshot from the official collection. You may notice false collections advertise for the Highrise Creature Club and Highrise Land NFTs on Opensea for a cheaper cost.", 'The original Highrise Creature collection is stationed on a layer-two blockchain system such as Immutable X and TokenTrove. They are not available on Opensea.\u200b Any Highrise Creature Club collection that is listed on Opensea is fake and will result in the loss of your funds if purchased! \u200b', '\u200b\u200bTrust Trades involve taking another person\'s word as a verbal promise to follow through with the terms that both parties agreed upon. This may include trusting that funds, in-game items, or an NFT will be sent  without the use of an Official Marketplace. Some players will involve a third party "middleman" to participate by holding the NFT and/or funds until the terms that are agreed upon by the buyer and seller is complete. Be cautious when choosing to participate in a Trust Trade. If using a middleman, make sure the middleman is legitamite by verifying who they are through the Highrise platform and not just within the Official Highrise Discord Server.\u200b\u200bImpersonation of staff accounts or trusted members of the community is very common!\u200bIt\'s always best to purchase or sell your NFT using the official marketplaces outlined in the Official Highrise Discord Server or through the Highrise Creature Club and Land Helpshift guides in-app.\u200b', "By participating in trust trades, you risk being scammed. Although someone may appear trustworthy with other community members vouching for their authenticity, it's not unheard of for people to gain trust by establishing a good reputation and in turn, decide to start scamming later on.", "Be aware that sharing your private key or seed phrase is similar to sharing the password of your an account. By sharing your private key or seed phrase, you are granting full access to your wallet to allow for any funds of assets to be transferred out of your wallet and into a scammer's wallet.", 'NEVER share your private key or seed phrase with anyone! It is not a requirement to buy, sell, or trade an NFT. Also, by allowing someone to create a wallet and give it to you also provides them permanent access to this wallet! \u200b', 'If you ever suspect that your wallet may be compromised, immediately create a new wallet through Metamask and transfer all of your funds and NFTs to the new wallet!', '\u200bRecap:', "Be aware of impersonation accounts - always verify who you're speaking with.", 'Do not click any links provided to you by another person. Always use the official links provided.', 'Be aware of false NFT collections.', 'Avoid participating in Trust Trades.', 'Avoid sharing your private key and/or seed phrase with anyone.']

Header: I can't afford a Highrise LAND plot. Are there any other ways to own a plot of LAND?
Paragraphs: ["Unfortunately at this time the only way to receive a plot of LAND is by purchasing one through the Official Highrise LAND OpenSea Collection. However, it's important to keep an eye on the Official Highrise Discord Server for any new updates!"]

Header: How do I become a Highrise LAND owner?
Paragraphs: ["By purchasing a single plot of LAND from the Official Highrise LAND OpenSea Collection, you can become a Highrise LAND owner! Soon you'll be able to create, customize and govern your own tower and manage your very own vibrant virtual community! As a LAND owner, you'll receive daily LAND tokens to spin upcoming exclusive in-game grabs, receive access to exclusive channels within the Discord server to enter unique contests and giveaways, as well as earn free in-game items during periodic airdrops."]

Header: What Are the Benefits of Owning Highrise LAND?
Paragraphs: ['LAND owners will have the ability to create customizable rooms within their tower; host richer experiences, earn their own income and manage their own economy!\u200b', 'LAND owners will soon be able to link their Highrise Room to their LAND Plots: Highrise Rooms can be linked to plots on the LAND map. This will allows users to access and display deep-links to their room on the map and also give them access to an exclusive boosts on their room’s max capacity.\u200b', 'LAND Tokens are a custom currency that is similar to Creature Coins. Holders will soon receive LAND Tokens for each standard LAND Plot they own on a daily basis, with a bonus in the case of premium plots. If they own an Estate, they will receive the tokens for each plot that make up the estate.\u200b', 'LAND Tokens will soon be used to purchase furniture from an exclusive shop for LAND owners. All furniture that has ever been released can be found in the shop (with the exception of furniture that has only been used in official rooms, that were sold for gold or were never publicly available). The furniture purchased in the LAND Shop will be account bound.\u200b', 'Boost Tokens and Voice Tokens will also be available in the upcoming LAND Shop.\u200b', 'Exclusive grabs for LAND owners will be periodically released. These grabs contain exclusive furniture items, and even new rare and exclusive versions of the Slime Pets as rewards.\u200b', 'LAND owners will be able to add extra room capacity to the Rooms linked to their LAND plots. If the LAND plot is standard, the room capacity can be boosted up to 75 users. If the plot is Premium, the room capacity can be boosted up to 120 users.\u200b', 'LAND owners will receive surprise Airdrops with miscellaneous furniture items.\u200b', 'LAND owners will have access to the exclusive LAND channel in the official Highrise Discord server. They will have access to periodical giveaways and contests, with rewards of exclusive versions of furniture and even pets.']

Header: How much does Highrise LAND cost?
Paragraphs: ["The cost of the LAND plots vary since parcels are all bought and sold by other players that own one. Prices can range from as low as $300 USD to as high as several thousand dollars, depending on the plot's rarity (Premium vs Standard) which differ by location and the appearance of the attached Slime-blob pet)."]

Header: How to Purchase Highrise LAND
Paragraphs: [' Warning: Purchasing Highrise LAND is done at your own risk. Blockchain technology is still new and evolving, and there is a risk of scams and other malicious activities. Please stay informed about basic security measures, such as using strong passwords and two-factor authentication, and only use services from trusted sources.', 'To purchase a Highrise LAND, you will need a Metamask wallet, crypto currency, and to be informed about the basic security measures of the blockchain technology.\u200bYou can follow the steps below:', '', 'A MetaMask wallet is like a digital bank account for your crypto currency. It allows you to store and manage your ETH (Ether) and other digital tokens in a secure, easy-to-use way. You can use your MetaMask wallet to purchase Highrise LAND and access all the perks and benefits that come with owning a plot of LAND.', "You should use a computer to use and create a MetaMask Wallet. It's the easiest and safest way. Follow these steps:", 'Install the MetaMask browser extension from the official website (https://metamask.io) or from the Chrome Web Store.', 'Click the MetaMask icon in your browser to open the extension.', 'Click the "Create a Wallet" button on the welcome screen.', 'Enter a strong password to protect your wallet and click "Create". Make sure to write down your password and store it in a safe place.', 'Read and accept the terms of use and privacy policy, then click "All Done".', 'You will be shown your MetaMask seed phrase, which is a series of 12-24 words that can be used to restore your wallet if you forget your password or lose access to your account. Write down your seed phrase and store it in a safe place.', ' This seed phrase can give anyone permanent full access to your account. Losing it means losing access to your account. Anyone with access to it can also have access to all the assets stored in your wallet. No one will ever ask you to share this information unless they’re trying to scam you.', 'Click the "Next" button to continue.', 'You will be taken to your MetaMask wallet where you can view your accounts, transaction history, and other information.', "OpenSea is the marketplace where the Highrise LAND can be purchased. Once you have created a Metamask wallet and added funds, you'll need to connect your wallet to OpenSea via a Metamask extension.", 'Here’s how to connect your wallet to OpenSea:', 'Visit https://opensea.io/ and click on the image of a wallet that\'s located in the top right corner of your screen. Press the "Connect Wallet”  button.', 'Choose the Metamask option.', 'A Metamask popup will show up, press “Next”, and then “Connect”.', 'Your Metamask wallet should now be connected to OpenSea.', '', 'To purchase Highrise LAND on OpenSea, you first need to purchase ETH (the crypto currency used to purchase Highrise LAND)', 'After your wallet has been connected to the OpenSea website (https://opensea.io/), press the wallet icon located at the top right section of your screen and press “Add funds”.', 'The easiest way to add funds is using the first option: Credit Card. Simply choose how much ETH you want to buy, and follow the on-screen steps to checkout. After purchasing, your funds will be added to your Metamask wallet instantly.', 'Alternatively, you can purchase ETH directly through MetaMask in some countries, or by using exchange apps such as Coinbase, Gemini, Moonpay, Shakepay, Binance, and Crypto.com.', "If you have purchased ETH using one of these alternatives, you will need to transfer the funds from the exchange wallet to your Metamask wallet to be able to use it. The exchange app will offer a transfer option in which you'll be required to input your MetaMask wallet address to send the funds.", 'Note: Transferring ETH requires a small gas fee to process the transaction. To learn more about gas and gas fees, check out: https://defiprime.com/gas', 'Choose the LAND plot that you would like to purchase from the OpenSea marketplace (https://opensea.io/collection/highrise-land). Even if your preferred plot is not listed for sale, you can still submit an offer and the owner can then choose to accept or deny the offer.', 'Press “Add to cart” then click on the wallet icon shown in the top right section of your screen. From there, choose your preferred payment option and click "Complete Purchase" to instantly buy the LAND parcel. Alternatively, you may click  “Make an offer” if you would like to offer a different price to the owner of the LAND parcel. You will be prompted to follow a series of on-screen steps.', " Unlike Creatures which were launched through Immutable X [a layer two blockchain], false LAND Collections can exist on OpenSea.  To ensure you're accessing the correct LAND collection, only use the official link provided above! ", '', "In order to be able to see your Slime-blob pet that is connected to your LAND, as well as receive all of the in-game perks and benefits, you'll need to connect your Metamask wallet to your Highrise account.", 'Head to highrise.game and log in using your usual in-app login credentials for your Highrise account.', 'Click over on your profile picture in the top right of the navigation bar. Then click on Settings. You’ll see a section called Blockchain, press the Connect Metamask Wallet button.', 'A Metamask popup will show up, press Sign. After that your Wallet will have been connected successfully.', " Now that you've integrated your crypto wallet, you'll be able to acquire in-game perks and benefits for owning a plot of LAND. This means that you'll be eligible to enter exclusive giveaways, receive random airdrops and even equip your Slime-blob pet to roam the Highrise universe at your side! Your Pet will appear in the first tab of your Highrise clothing inventory.\u200b\u200b", 'You will automatically start receiving all of the benefits and perks for owning a plot of LAND  for as long as your Metamask wallet containing at least one plot remains connected to your Highrise account.', 'Note: At this stage in the development of LAND, access to individual plots is not currently available to the owner.  However, LAND owners will still acquire various in-game benefits by having their wallet with their LAND asset connected to Highrise!']

Header: How to create Estates
Paragraphs: ['Level up your LAND! Creating an Estate gives you a few extra creative & promotional perks, including bigger rooms, customized thumbnails, and direct, personalized URL links to your world. Ready to start building?', 'First, make sure you have connected a wallet to your Highrise Account. You can find more details on how to connect ImmutableX to Highrise in the other FAQ in this segment, titled "How do I create and link a wallet to my Highrise account?"', '', "Second, check what kind of LAND you own: only L1 LAND is available for Estate creation. This means that your LAND parcel must live on the blockchain. Any LAND acquired using Highrise LAND Deeds was not originally minted on the blockchain, so it won't be eligible for Estate creation.", 'Please note that gas fees are required in order to create your Estate.', '', "Third, note the quantity of LAND required for each Estate. Here are the available dimensions of LAND Estates and the parcels you'll need to create them:", '3x3', '6x6', '9x9', '12x12', 'Log in to highrise.game on web and navigate from the Inventory or Map to your LAND Info menu and hit "Create Estate." Follow this link directly to the Estate creation page: https://highrise.game/estate/create', "Next, select which LAND parcels you'd like to use for your Estate in the Map view; parcels will be highlighted in black once selected. Once you're ready to go, hit Approve.", 'Sign into MetaMask to Approve your Estate creation.', "After you've approved your Estate, you can feel free to leave the page while the request is processing.", 'And... BAM! Come back to find yourself in possession of your very own Highrise Estate!', '', "Not sure if you want Estate perks, or want to create an even bigger Estate using new LAND plots? Don't worry: you can dissolve your estate at any time.", "Head back to Inventory or Map and select the Estate you'd like to dissolve.", 'Hit the Dissolve button.', 'Next, sign into MetaMask to confirm the dissolution.', "Wow, wasn't that easy? .", '', "We're all here for the customization, right? Give your Estate a custom thumbnail to give our Creature Island some spice!", 'From within the Map or Inventory, select your Estate and select Edit Estate. Next, select Upload Photo', 'Drag & drop or browse your files to find that perfect pic. You can use any of these formats - jpg, jpeg, png, or webp - but make sure your file is no larger than 90KB.', 'Next, crop your image into a square and hit Upload > Save in order to finalize your thumbnail.', 'Voila! You just got thumbnailed!']

[LAND will still become accessible without completing this process but is solely connected to the Highrise account it was purchased with. \u200b\u200b', 'Head to https://highrise.game/land and log into the Highrise account that contains your plot of LAND.
